MasterUpdated on 31 Oct 2018It is hard for others to specifically recommend you a stock to buy since we have different risk tolerance, objetives and views (which may contradict) . Whilst it is cheaper now, it's also more volatile.For starters, you can try researching on the various companies (well-known brands such as SingTel, ShengSiong etc) in the local market first on good fundamentals/high dividend-paying/... to suit your objective. Alternatively, there are robo-advisors and ETFs if you are not adept at stocks trading yet.
